#summary How you can contribute to Abot.
#labels Featured

=Contribute=
Here are few things that the Abot project could use. However, please reach out if you have another contribution.
  * Spread the word on blogs/websites and tell others why Abot is great
  * Report bugs or suggest features here http://code.google.com/p/abot/issues
  * Let us know when you create a cool project that uses Abot
  * Submit bug fixes or features (contact me if your interested or comment on this page)
  * A logo
  * Donations (link coming soon)
  * Send emails abot-web-crawler@googlegroups.com
